Description:
WHO SAID YOU COULDN’T GET INTO THE PROPERTY MARKET?
Here is an ideal opportunity for you to get into the property market and secure your first home. Ideally situated in a no through road, you will enjoy the charm that only a home with high ceilings, exposed beams and timber linings can offer. Enjoy cosy evenings in front of the crackling wood fire or make the most of relaxed living in the warmer weather on the large covered decked area. There are 3 bedrooms, bathroom complete with bath and a functional kitchen that overlooks the rear yard. Set on a useable ¼ acre with enough room for outdoor activities as well as a double carport, this is a property that will suit those looking to add their own touches as well as investors and first home buyers. Sure to be popular, don’t hesitate to inspect this home.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 3 Maillard Street, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
4 Bedroom Gem in an Affordable Price Range!
Don’t miss this opportunity to purchase a great family home within walking distance to schools, Cockatoo Township, public transport and recreation reserve; and in an affordable price range. The solid brick veneer home offers low maintenance family living, leaving you with time to spend on the things that matter. The home features 4 robed bedrooms, the spacious Master with ensuite effect access to the bathroom, lounge room, separate dining room, modern kitchen and second toilet. The kitchen is good as new with ample storage, gas cooktop and island bench with kick drawers, a clever use of otherwise wasted space. Features include some polished floorboards, ducted vacuum system, ceiling fans, mains gas ducted heating and ducted air conditioning as well as a convenient 2nd toilet. A standout feature of this home is the 6x7m outdoor entertaining deck with covered pitched roof, café blinds, chiminea and lovely tranquil tree outlook and filtered views to Gembrook. The established garden is low maintenance with flowering trees, tree ferns and lush lawns with a handy garden shed for storage. For vehicles you have a double carport and rear yard access for parking the trailer, boat, caravan etc. So if you’re in the market for a great buy, don’t hesitate to book your private inspection before this gem is gone.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Don’t Miss This One!!!!!
Immaculate Presentation both inside and out is the feature of this delightful and fully renovated, three bedroom cedar weatherboard home. Nestled in a quiet and leafy location, on a fenced and near level block of almost a 1/3 of an acre offering established gardens, expansive rear lawn areas and multiple outdoor zones that are great to relax and enjoy the privacy and beauty that surrounds. With absolutely nothing to be done, the home offers a new gourmet kitchen with gas cooker, two living areas and a new quality bathroom. Extra features include polished floor boards, gas heating, split system and solid fuel heater. Step outside to a private and covered entertainment area, garden shedding and extensive landscaping. This very sought after property will suit first home buyers, downsizers or investors. Be quick for this one!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Hidden Gem behind the Hedge!
This fantastic property is privately located behind its lush front hedge and is situated on a beautiful 3/4 acre gently sloping block with dual access from a sealed road and walking distance to Cockatoo’s shops, cafes, primary school and public transport making it perfect for families. The home offers spacious rooms with an open plan kitchen/dining and living areas. The country style kitchen with new flooring has Blackwood cupboards and a wood fired stove for amazing baked goods as well as a conventional stove for convenience and there is ample storage. Then you have the lounge room with brick feature wall with wood heater and wood storage and the home has gas ducted heating throughout for convenience. Add to this the bedrooms, there are 4 of them, 3 have built in robes, the Master with ensuite and you’ll love the family bathroom with sunken spa bath for relaxing after a long day. Entertaining outdoors is covered with a paved undercover entertaining area and the park like back yard is mostly cleared with a 10 x 6m shed with concrete floor and power, a chicken run and cubby house for the kids. Given this homes location and second driveway access which is perfect for the tradie or those with oversized vehicles such as caravans, boats etc., it’s going to be very popular and won’t be on the market long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
DECEASED ESTATE *MUST BE SOLD*
Amongst lush surrounds in the rural hamlet of Cockatoo, this property gives you the quiet lifestyle you seek in a classic clinker brick home that has potential for its new owner to update and renovate to suit their needs and style. With its wrap around verandah and colonial windows adding to an already appealing façade, the home looks great from the street and inside it feels homely, comfortable and relaxing. Features include a generous L-shaped lounge/dining room with an open fire as well as a slate tiled family/meals area adjoining the neat kitchen with updated stainless steel appliances. There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as 2 bathrooms including a full ensuite in the master bedroom. Ducted heating is a welcome inclusion with winter approaching and outside you also find a double carport and a big backyard with a covered entertaining patio and handy garden shed. And with the Cockatoo town centre close by you can access local shops and cafes as well as Cockatoo Primary School and buses in minutes.
On-Site Auction Saturday 26th May at 3:30pm
To view the statement of information click the below link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1jPwnGjCAWqo_abZa-gr9uxMoLW1IURPp?usp=sharing

Description:
EVERYTHING YOU WANT AND SO MUCH MORE
Located in a highly desirable street near the Cockatoo Primary School and only a few minutes’ walk to Cockatoo Main Street and all it has to offer, this weatherboard home is ready for you to move into, with all the modern comforts. This immaculate three bedroom family home has a fully renovated kitchen, bathroom and laundry all with quality inclusions and clever living solutions, like instantaneous gas hot water, two split system air conditioners, gas ducted heating throughout, stainless steel appliances in an open plan kitchen and adjoining living spaces. Step outside and be wowed by the huge 10 x 5 pitched roof outdoor entertaining area, fully plumbed gas directly to two natural gas heaters and BBQ outlet, café style blinds to keep the weather out, exposed aggregate concrete, lighting and outdoor ceiling fans. All surrounded by fully landscaped gardens and connected to all services including NBN and sewer. For those with tools and a few toys there’s plenty of room in the 6 x 9 garage on concrete slab equipped with electric roller doors, access via a fully sealed driveway, 3 x 3 garden shed on concrete slab, a carport at the side of the property, and turning circle at the front making it ideal for tradies and those who love projects. Don’t miss this opportunity for you and your family to enjoy the hills life, as homes with all these inclusions don’t come along every day. Contact Mat Fitch 0473363606 to arrange your inspection now!
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
The Duality of Life
The art of a happy family unit is striking a balance between togetherness and existing independently as individuals, between unity & having the space to be yourself. The design of this home supports that balance by providing versatility of living and bedroom options under the one roof with plenty of entry points to accommodate the comings and goings of the crazy-busy modern lifestyle.
This solid brick veneer home is built over two levels with 4 bedrooms upstairs and an additional self-contained apartment downstairs with own access. The self-contained apartment is currently set up as 1 bedroom, utility and 1 extra-large living area that could easily be converted into a 2nd bedroom plus living. Bring the grand-folks, throw the teenagers or twenty-somethings downstairs or earn an income as a B&B (STCA).
Privately set back off a sealed road on a usable 5570m2 with outdoor entertainment & an above ground pool cleverly protected by its own dome.
Dual-accommodation
Master plus ensuite & WIR
2nd Bedroom with WIR
Oodles of storage
Neatly presented
Limed timber walls
All Mains Services
Water Storage
Peace & Privacy
Call Katie on 0428 744 498 for more info or a private inspection.

Description:
Fantastic First Home or Investment
Located next to the Primary School & within 600 metres of the Main Street of Cockatoo, this perfect starter home or investment offers 2 living areas - one upstairs and one down - all on 1012m2 (approx.) in a NRZ1 Zoning. A new ducted heating system will keep you toasty over the coming winter months and other essential but unseen improvements will give you peace of mind. Sit back and relax in the spa bath in the main bathroom, watch life fly-by as you sit on the upstairs balcony and appreciate all the extra under-house storage. The possibilities for this property really are endless!
• Double carport & off-street parking
• New ducted heating
• Renovation opportunity
• Zoning: Neighbourhood Residential Zone 1
• Estimated Rental: $380 - $400 PW
Cockatoo is enjoying a fresh wave of popularity thanks in equal part to the reputation of Cockatoo Primary School, the family-friendly environment, a tight-knit community and the down to earth demographic. Watch Cockatoo really take off over the next few years with the new IGA development in the main street precinct and other new & exciting businesses.
Contact Katie Woods on 0428 744 498 for more information.

Description:
PEACEFUL AND PARKLIKE SETTING OF OVER 2/3 ACRE
A peaceful, park like setting with a creek at the rear boundary of approx. 2738m2 surrounds this beautifully presented weatherboard home that is perfect for first home buyers, investors or those requiring an inspiring setting to encourage creative pursuits. Comprising of three bedrooms, an updated kitchen with gas cooker and dishwasher, a light filled open plan living area with atmospheric wood fire and a new family bathroom. Special features include gas heater, split system heating and cooling and polished timber flooring. The huge covered rear deck is the perfect place to settle back and delight in the sights and sounds of nature or enjoy alfresco dining and is ideal for relaxed entertaining. Also outdoors there is a carport, access to the rear yard, a garden shed and a huge ‘man cave’ that provides ample space for ‘toys’ or would make a great workshop. What a wonderful place to make the most of Hills living. Arrange your inspection today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Immaculate Family Home on over ½ Acre!
Don’t miss this opportunity to purchase this immaculately presented home in a quiet private location within walking distance to local sporting grounds and public transport. The attractive brick veneer home has a concrete circular driveway, bullnose verandah running ¾ of the home and has been beautifully maintained leaving you with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. On offer are 3 bedrooms, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite, add to this the spacious lounge room with wood heater and garden outlook, then you have the meals area with access to the fabulous entertaining deck with private leafy outlook. The hub of the home is the lovely country style kitchen with white cabinetry, timber benchtops, stainless dishwasher and completed with a 3 oven, enamel Belling oven with gas cooktop for baking amazing home baked goodies for the family. To the other side of the kitchen you have a study and/or second living area, again with access to the sun filled deck. Features include colonial windows, cathedral ceilings, brick feature walls, polished floor boards, mains gas ducted heating and air conditioning. Outside cars are covered with a double carport and sealed driveway and the kids are going to love the back yard with plenty of flat usable land and cubby house and whilst mains water is connected you have 2x5000lt water tanks for the garden. This fantastic home is well worth an inspection, you won’t be disappointed.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards 0400 100 155

Description:
Calling All Tradies
You wanted a shed? This western-red cedar split level home on 1792m2 comes with a 12m x 6m beauty incorporating a workroom & laundry with large access doors, side access & 15AMP power to get you revved up. Plus there’s a double carport for all your vehicles. This cosy home commands an elevated position on a largely clear corner block close to Cockatoo primary school, shops, services & transport. Watch the world go by from the front verandah.
Sold with some renovations as work-in-progress for the new owner to over-see.
- Chicken coop & veggie patches
- Front & rear verandas
- Recently renovated kitchen with 900mm stove
- Large corner block
- Double carport

Description:
Inspiring Mudbrick on ½ Acre with Views!
If you love mudbrick homes, renowned for their thermal qualities and warm hug feeling, you are going to fall head over heels for this one. Situated on a ½ acre block of gorgeous landscaped gardens with captivating mountain views, the home has been lovingly and immaculately maintained with absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy the peaceful lifestyle. On offer are 5 bedrooms or 4 with study, 2 are on the top level which includes the stunning Master with parents retreat, its own balcony to take in the outlook, walk in robe and modern spacious bathroom. Something you will immediately notice about this home is the amount of natural light and with the light coloured painted walls the light bounces off ensuring all rooms are light and bright as with the kitchen, lounge room and dining all on the middle level. Then on ground level you have the further 3 robed bedrooms, family bathroom and laundry. Other features include a perfect mix of rustic and modern with beautiful exposed timber beams, thatched ceilings, skylights, cosy wood heater in the lounge, as new carpets and there is a separate rumpus room or home office also located on the ground floor with storage area. Outside the undercover outdoor entertaining is spacious with built in BBQ and outlook of the delightful garden with meandering boardwalk, native garden plantings and rock water feature. Vehicles are covered with an as new double garage with concrete floor, power, fully lined and freshly painted. This magical home will inspire you, so do yourself a favour and book a private inspection to avoid disappointment.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards, 0400 100 155

Description:
Enchanted, Yet Edible Garden
**Due to strong market conditions, please note the Saturday 14th Open for Inspection has been CANCELLED.**
Bursting with character, magic, quirk and a tangible feel-good vibe this home promises to nourish your soul and your belly. Super close to Cockatoo Main Street and the Primary School on a sealed road, this 2 level home has the comfort & function you seek.
The front garden is bursting with fairy-tale colour – fuchsias, begonias, dahlias, salvias, sedums, feature trees, rock walls, pathways & bog garden.
The rear garden is like-wise packed with established vegetable patches currently yielding potatoes, amaranth, beans, raspberries, fruit trees, lavender & herbs all growing in abundance.
The front porch is the perfect spot to reap the rewards of a weekend tending the gardens. Under the house there is enough room to build a workshop for all your gardening needs - along with the single shed at the rear of the property.
Inside, you enter the main living room with meals and a quaint country kitchen with large walk-in pantry. There is one bedroom on this level with main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry/mudroom.
Up the stairs you will find 3 further bedrooms. I can imagine being a child and simply falling in love with the 4th smaller Garrett-like bedroom snuggled up with a book and listening to the rain on the tin roof, safe and warm.
All services, concrete stumps & ready for sale.
If getting back to basics and becoming part of a thriving local community is what you want - then this is the home for you.
Contact Katie Woods on 0428 744 498 for more information.
Insights: 3 Cockatoo Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable, Private Haven on Almost 1 Acre!
If you’re searching for own private haven this is the perfect property for you. Privately located with lovely serene outlook this property has a lot to offer and is close to all that thriving Cockatoo has to offer including primary school and public transport. Fantastic first home for young families or the astute investor, the home has been renovated with taste and style, offering 3 great sized bedrooms with built in robes, lounge room with cosy wood heater and convenient split system and open plan kitchen and meals area. The gorgeous kitchen is country in style with white cabinetry, subway tiles, timber bench tops and has a large pantry and new stainless appliances. For entertaining you’ll love the sun filled deck, partially undercover which is accessed through the meals area and has a lovely elevated outlook of the rear yard and tree tops beyond. Features include gas ducted heating, new carpets, window furnishings, fresh paint throughout and mains gas, water and power are connected. For vehicles you have rear yard access to the large shed via a sealed driveway, with concrete floor and power with room enough for 4 cars and a workshop. There is enough land here to store all your toys such as caravans, boats, trailers etc so it’s bound to be popular with tradies and the like so be quick to avoid disappointment and book your private inspection of this delightful property today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
DECKED FOR ENTERTAINING!
Set in a very private Cockatoo location on approx. 2014m2 and at the end of a no through road is this well presented BV family home. The very functional floor plan comprises of two separate living areas, family bathroom and a light and bright, centrally located and well-appointed kitchen that adjoins the main living area. There are three bedrooms all with BIRs and the master bedroom, with ensuite is positioned for privacy to the front of the home with the additional two bedrooms positioned to the rear. Special features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solid fuel heater and timber flooring. Step outside to a huge outdoor covered deck perfect for entertaining which is big enough for the whole family to enjoy. The rear yard has plenty of room to accommodate a trade’s person or families needing space and as an added bonus - there is excellent under house space ideally suited to a workshop. This property is a real Gem!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

***ENTER VIA – 8 PATERNOSTER RD COCKATOO BETWEEEN 7 & 9 PATERNOSTER RD, COCKATOO***
This is a perfect opportunity to get into the market and have a place to call your own. Set back from a sealed road with off street parking and a single carport this useable half acre (approx.) backs onto reserve land with a three bedroom home ready for you to put your stamp on. Featuring a kitchen, living room and three great sized bedrooms with central bathroom, the property is light filled and on prestigious Paternoster Road. This property represents a great opportunity to get into the market or potentially making some money by renovating and selling. This property won’t be here for long so arrange an appointment today. call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609.

Alex Scott & Staff are proud to present Lot 1 Brisbanes Road, Cockatoo. Description:
Sweet Caroline!
If you have been looking for the perfect home in the hills, look no further! 19 Caroline Avenue is cute, cosy and convenient on 1,010m2 (approx.).
Stepping through the front door of this gorgeous weatherboard you instantly feel comfortable and at home.
Featuring three bedrooms with a generous ensuite and walk in robe to master. The two secondary bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by a centralized bathroom and separate powder room which provides great flexibility as the children grow.
The classic country kitchen with oversized island bench is the centrepeice of the home which includes a dishwasher and 1200 belling oven (for the aspiring chef!)
An open plan living, and dining zones flows out onto the expansive back verandah which is a great extension of the property and the perfect place to relax and unwind overlooking the lightly treed block.
All services are connected to the property, gas ducted heating throughout & split system cooling. A Double carport, garden shed, a workshop/home office or teenager retreat under the home – all of this and more! conveniently located opposite the primary school and a short stroll to Main street, shops & cafes's. This one really is the complete package!

Description:
Room With A View To Your Future
What absolute bliss to sit on the rear deck of this elevated weatherboard home on 2000m2 approx. drinking tea in the morning sunshine. This simple, feel good home faces east towards Gembrook. Its proximity to Paternoster Road serves as a quick getaway to Pakenham, Berwick or into the local townships of Cockatoo & Emerald, where you'll find a wealth of fine cafes, restaurants, shops, schools and services. Neat as can be, the garden is mostly lawn with some stunning established trees providing dappled shade. Under the house there is a bonus room which is plaster-lined and currently houses the laundry and storage. It would work well as a studio or office, as it stays super cool through summer. The in/out driveway is another big plus.
There is a really homely feel to this property. The entrance hall has parquetry flooring with separate toilet and great sized bathroom. Both bedrooms have BIR and share the easterly view across the treetops. The main living space is open plan with doors that open onto the deck and onto the front shaded walkway. Crank up the pot-belly fire in the cosy winter months. The galley kitchen has lots of storage and bright yellow bench tops that have done the fashion merry-go-round and are looking pretty funky to me.
Come to the open and avoid disappointment. Properties like this do not last long.
For more info call Katie on 0428 744 498 or Georgia on 0488 997 150
Insights: 21 Maurice Street, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Rustic Charmer on 1 Acre Plus
Close to town, public transport and the local primary school, this characterful log cabin has everything that people move to the Hills for - peace, privacy & SPACE. An opportunity to update - have a google for "log cabins painted black"!
Set on 4400sqm (approx.) and fully fenced, the block is alive with the sound of frogs coming from a large pond at the front entrance. There are many aspects to the garden including walkways, lots of beautiful planting (Victorian Christmas Bush, Weeping Acacias and Fruit Trees) large lawn spaces for the kids to play and a veggie garden.
A mass of wisteria greets you as you enter the large 4 space carport. This is a very serviceable area and includes an air-conditioned office and workshop converted from the double garage.
Step inside and you’ll find a perfectly presented and convenient home with an exceptional country kitchen. Cooking dinner at night is made easy with the size of the kitchen which also includes a built-in corner pantry, enough space for a double fridge, breakfast bar and an Ilve stove top.
There are 2 living areas - one that relates to the kitchen and another at an incredible size of 9x6m that comes with a quality 7' x 3.5' hydrolic pool table, that doubles as a dining table. Originally the space included a 4th bedroom so you could revert it to a 4th bedroom if that suits your growing family’s needs (STCA). Both lounge rooms offer wood fired heating – one is a large open fire and the other an old-school coonara style that can double as an open fire place.
All bedrooms are of good size with BIR’s and the master bedroom includes a “his and hers”.
And finally… after a long day’s work, you’ll enjoy nothing more than coming home to a glass of champagne and relaxing in the spa bath in the large main bathroom.
Call Katie on 0428 744 498 or Georgia on 0488 997 150 for more information.
Insights: 7 Belgrave Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.
